title: want to test my ability
body: I feel like im a good player and dont deserve the rank im given. Anyone out there willing to let me play a game on a high plat or low diamond account?

replies.body: Account sharing isn't allowed in the ToS, they'd be risking their account by letting you play on it. You'd be better off finding a Diamond ADC to 1v1, or ideally 9 high Plat/Diamond players who'd be willing to custom with you.
